name: Block Drop Monster Chop
description:
This is a co-op game, meant to be played on the WINNITRON. You can also play it on a computer keyboard, the controls are just a little bit awkward!

Player 1: Move with Arrow keys, do your action with the "." key

Player 2: Move with WASD, do your action with the "1" key

Team:

  • Code: @graebor
  • Art: @amymja
  • VO Production: @julianbeutel
  • Voice Acting: Everyone at the Winnipeg LD41 meetup!

"Mischief Maker" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
